doc.after: Lethbridge has designated 16Â percent of the land within city boundaries as parkland, including the 755 hectares (1,870 acres) Oldman River valley parks system.[84] It has facilities for field sports and baseball, a disc golf course, a skate park, a BMX track, a climbing wall, a dozen tennis courts, and seven pools. It is home to five golf courses, including the award-winning Paradise Canyon Golf Resort, and is within 30 kilometres (19Â mi) of several others.[67]
